actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the International Finance Corporation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the International Finance Corporation Act to authorize the United States Governor of the Corporation: (1) to vote for an increase in the authorized capital stock of the Corporation; and (2) if such increase becomes effective, to subscribe to a specified amount of such stock on behalf of the United States. Authorizes the appropriation of $112,000,000 for the increase in the United States subscription.

titles.title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the International Finance Corporation, and for other purposes.
